txt.en:
'Greetings, good adventurer. My name is Darri of the Iron Garrison. I was sent here by the Iron Garrison to safe-guard Mekeb-faham against the intrusion of Orcs and beasts alike. Unfortunately, I have arrived too late and something has already moved in.

'While I am a competent soldier, I have neither the skill nor the training to confront the numbers I fear reside within.

'But you look able enough to aid me in this effort. Were I to offer you a small reward, would you be willing to undertake the task of clearing out the intruders from within Mekeb-faham?'

'You certainly are a handy one to have around when skulls and shells need to be cracked, I will give you that!\n\n'As I promised you, here is your compensation for your efforts. Now don't look at me like I've short-changed you. Given my own competency in combat, I am certain I will have additional opportunities to hire you in the future!'
'Have you completed your task yet? Please do so, then return to me when you have finished.'

Not even libraries are safe from the ravages of Orcs and beasts alike. Whether their interest in them be the pursuit of information or just a dry place to nest, the libraries of Moria risk an ugly degradation. Seeking to protect the literature and lineage of Moria, the Iron Garrison has sent a representative to Mekeb-faham to prevent it from falling into the hands of the enemy or becoming a breeding ground for all manner of foul beasts.
The entrance to Mekeb-faham lies within Hadudbâb.\n\nDarri has asked you to assist him in clearing Mekeb-faham of the vermin within.
Darri can be found at Hadudbâb along the southern road in Durin's Way.\n\nYou should return to Darri to receive a reward for your efforts.
